name: FightWynnflaedCawthorne
_source: s;Cawthorne;Brassfield?{w} What do you think you're doing, woman?{w} Put that weapon down.;center;;boss_convo_left

s;Cawthorne;I don't want to hear your excuses.{w}{clear}You were called upon to serve the empire, and you are failing to serve.{w}{clear}We don't chat with traitors.|We execute them.{w} You know this.;center;;boss_convo_left

s;Brassfield;I do.{w} I've carried out many an execution before my service to you.|Consider this a sentencing.{w}{clear}You, the emperor, and all his lackeys are the true traitors to the empire!;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Cawthorne;Cute.{w} Got all that off your chest?;center;;boss_convo_left
s;Brassfield;Aye.{w} I've said my piece.{w} And like you say...{w} we don't chat with traitors.;center;;boss_convo_right
s;Cawthorne;Heh.{w} I almost like you, Brassfield.{w}{clear}Alright then.{w} Let's stuff our gobs and let our blades do the talking.;center;;boss_convo_left
